sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default class Profile extends Component { state = { alesReq: null, sgk: null, experience: null, ALESResult: null, englishExamResult: null, referenceLetter: null, referenceLetter2: null, statementOfPurpose: null, ALESResultInput: null, experinceInput: null, passport: null, passportInput: null, permissionLetter: null, permissionLetterInput: null, mastersTranscriptInput: null, }; upload = async (event) => { const target = event.target; const name = target.name; var fileInput = event.target.files[0]; var fileName = event.target.files[0].name; var myHeaders = new Headers(); myHeaders.append("Authorization", window.localStorage.getItem("token")); var formdata = new FormData(); formdata.append("title", name); formdata.append("document", fileInput, fileName); var requestOptions = { method: "POST", headers: myHeaders, body: formdata, redirect: "follow", }; fetch("http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/documents/upload/", requestOptions) .then((response) => response.text()) .then((result) => console.log(result)) .catch((error) => console.log("error", error)); }; //If applicant applis with ALES, then the Ales Result is needed from the applicant ALESReqHandle = (event) => { const target = event.target; if (target.value === "Yes") { document.getElementById("ALES").hidden = false; } else { document.getElementById("ALES").hidden = true; } }; //If applicant is experienced, than the Working experience document is wanted from user experienceHandle = (event) => { const target = event.target; if (target.value === "Yes") { document.getElementById("AlesChooseWarning4").hidden = true; document.getElementById("ExperienceWarning").hidden = true; document.getElementById("experienceInput").disabled = false; } else { document.getElementById("AlesChooseWarning4").hidden = true; document.getElementById("ExperienceWarning").hidden = false; document.getElementById("experienceInput").disabled = true; } }; //If Nationality is "OTHER" then the passport copy is needed from the applicant citizenshipHandle = (event) => { const target = event.target; if (target.value === "Turkish") { this.setState({ passportInput: null }); } else { this.setState({ passportInput: (

Passport

), }); } }; //If applicant is working the permission letter is needed from the applicant workingHandle = (event) => { const target = event.target; if (target.value === "Yes") { this.setState({ permissionLetterInput: (

Permission Letter

), }); } else { this.setState({ permissionLetterInput: null }); } }; //If applicant is working the permission letter is needed from the applicant applicationHandle = (event) => { const target = event.target; if (target.value === "PhD") { this.setState({ mastersTranscriptInput: (

Masters Transcript

), }); } else { this.setState({ mastersTranscriptInput: null }); } }; render() { return (
